title: MySecure
author: MySecure
content: Dear friends, We are glad to see you on our platform MySecureWhat is MySecure?MySecure is a global P2P Bitcoin non-custodial trading platform. Here, all trades occur only between buyers and sellers involving no third parties and locked in multi-signature escrow.Buy and sell Bitcoins Worldwide. You can choose any payment method. Any currency. No KYC. Commission 0.25%Be part of the new MySecure DEX community. https://mysecure.worldP.S. Bitcoiners of the world unite! Let's build our new decentralized life together!

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: You should move this to Service Discussion -> Exchanges as your ANN thread instead on this board. This board is more like a p2p platform in this forum.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Why the choice of the domain, though? It doesn't bring out the first impression that it's related to p2p trading of cryptocurrencies like the way Localbitcoins or Localcryptos would.Your project also needs a lot more exposure if you are to get volumes. So you are going to invest so much in promotions and adverts if you want to have a chance of pulling numbers.

comments.author: Edwardard
comments.body: First of all, welcome to the forum, its nice to see a new addition to the bitcoin p2p platforms. Would you like to mention any key advantage(s) of using your platform rather than binance's p2p service which is even totally free compared to yours (which takes a 0.5% fee)? Quote from: MySecure on February 24, 2023, 11:38:17 PMBe part of the new MySecure DEX community.I guess dex and p2p are not the same ?!I would also recommend you to do some promotional events in the forum like giveaways for most active traders, sig. campaign, etc. It will help build your brand image  Hope you consider it. Good luck!

comments.author: Bestdss
comments.body: Setting up a Bitcoin P2P is very nice and hopefully it's secured as much as possible. I do believe that much marketing is still needed for this platform for a massive adoption and ratings. On the other side I don't know if 0.5 commission is fair because many CEX will alow you use P2P for free, unless the 0.5 commission is coz of no KYC, but I will prefer to do KYC and use P2P for free than Withdraw P2P with 0.5 charge without KYC

comments.author: grahammiranda13
comments.body: Is this yours? If yes do you plan on scaling? I am looking to invest in a project

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: Quote from: grahammiranda13 on March 05, 2023, 04:09:14 PMIs this yours? If yes do you plan on scaling? I am looking to invest in a project I'm currently working on something similar, please send me a message with any questions if you're interested and I will explain more.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: I see you are using some Russian bank and with the recent measures and the prohibition of many countries from dealing with Russian banks, there will be no problem for users, as we are not from the local Board.this is multinational forum and i don't thing they can deal with Russian.Therefore, you must either impose the identity or tell the allowed and prohibited countries.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: Husires on March 05, 2023, 10:12:13 PMI see you are using some Russian bank and with the recent measures and the prohibition of many countries from dealing with Russian banks, there will be no problem for users, as we are not from the local Board.this is multinational forum and i don't thing they can deal with Russian.Therefore, you must either impose the identity or tell the allowed and prohibited countries.I think they allow all countries from around the globe except for the United States as per their terms. If the few traders who have so far made the offers in the platform are genuine, then it probably a coincidence that most of them are from Russia. But I do some offer from the US as well

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on March 06, 2023, 10:33:28 PMQuote from: Husires on March 05, 2023, 10:12:13 PMI see you are using some Russian bank and with the recent measures and the prohibition of many countries from dealing with Russian banks, there will be no problem for users, as we are not from the local Board.this is multinational forum and i don't thing they can deal with Russian.Therefore, you must either impose the identity or tell the allowed and prohibited countries.I think they allow all countries from around the globe except for the United States as per their terms. If the few traders who have so far made the offers in the platform are genuine, then it probably a coincidence that most of them are from Russia. But I do some offer from the US as wellÂ  I tried to search using filters to select other countries, but it didn't work.I don't know if the error is temporary or not.The number of traders on the site seems limited, which makes the use of such a platform limited.the site loads slowly.
